description: A small, meticulously folded piece of paper, filled with tiny handwriting and some surprisingly precise diagrams of subway tunnels, access codes, ventilation shafts, andâ€¦guard shifts?  You have the feeling they weren't supposed to write any of this stuff down.

use_action.message: You add the hidden stations to your map

description: This is a printed guide to the local regional transportation systems.  This one specifically seems to show bus stations, airports, and entrances to subways.

use_action.message: You add the regional transportation systems to your map.

description: This is a printed topographical map of the local area.  Originally of military origin, it details the locations of evacuation centers and military facilities.  Using it will add points of interest to your map.

use_action.message: You add roads and facilities to your map.

description: This is a hand-drawn map of the local area.  Whoever created it has marked down the locations of nearby supply sources including gun stores and gas stations.  Using it will add points of interest to your map.

use_action.message: You add roads and possible supply points to your map.

description: This is a road map for the local area.  Listing information on civic sites like hospitals and police stations, it can be used to add points of interest to your map.

use_action.message: You add roads and points of interest to your map.

name: subway maintenance map
description: This is a map of subway tunnels formerly used by public maintenance workers.  Using it will add subway lines and underground stations to your map.

use_action.message: You add subway lines and underground stations to your map.

name: sewer maintenance map
description: This is a map of sewer tunnels formerly used by public maintenance workers.  Using it will add sewer systems to your map.

use_action.message: You add the local sewer systems to your map.

name: spelunker's map
description: This is a handmade map of local caving spots, some requiring trespassing.  There's probably bigger worries than that now, though.

use_action.message: You mark potential entry points and underground routes in the margins of your map.

description: This is a printed guide to the best local trails.  It has general details about the trails, trailhead amenities, suggestions for the best thru-hikes, and advice on interacting with local wildlife in a responsible and respectful manner.

use_action.message: You add trails and trailheads to your map.

description: This is glossy printed pamphlet for tourists that details local hotels and attractions.

use_action.message: You add roads and tourist attractions to your map.

description: This is glossy printed pamphlet that details dining establishments in the local area.  Printed by the Chamber of Commerce, it lists the addresses of all the best diners and bars.  Using it will add points of interest to your map.

use_action.message: You add roads and restaurants to your map.

description: This is a map of local rivers and lakes, along with the location of notable points of interest such as marinas and lighthouses.

use_action.message: You add local waterways and notable features on the shore to your map.

description: This is a printout of a local road map, with several buildings circled in red.  Using it will add roads and abandoned buildings to your map.

use_action.message: You add roads and abandoned buildings to your map.

description: This is a printed satellite map of the local area.  Due to it's low quality and lack of map legend, you are unable to recognise most buildings.  Using it will add terrain and roads to your map.

use_action.message: You add terrain and roads to your map.
